thread.title: Children to be trained in heroin overdose drug

title: Children to be trained in heroin overdose drug
text:
Published By: Louisville Courier-Journal - Today 
With opioid overdoses growing each year, a mother is hoping to teach children how to reverse a heroin overdose with a life-saving drug....
